alert.note: Alert for Charles Mix; Douglas; Hutchinson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 30 at 1:28PM MDT until July 30 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Charles Mix County in south central South Dakota... Southeastern Douglas County in south central South Dakota... Southwestern Hutchinson County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 315 PM CDT. * At 228 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Delmont, or 13 miles west of Parkston, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Delmont around 240 PM CDT. Tripp around 255 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
